title: WI&M Advertising Map
description: Advertising map for railway lines. Shown W.I.&M. route from Palouse to Bovill. Map includes Potlatch, Freeze, Onaway, Woodfell, Princeton, Harvard, Stanford, Vassar, Avon, Deary, Jansville, Helmer, Cornell, Bovill, Collin, Park, Taney, Nora, Troy, Howell, Cornwall, Joel, Moscow, and Viola.
subject: maps (documents); railroads (infrastructure)
location: Palouse, Washington; Bovill, Idaho; Potlach, Idaho

source: Washington, Idaho, & Montana Railway Records, MG139, University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives
